ComicInfo.Summary:
THE MAD HATTER
After being confined to the recesses of Violet Liddle's brain, the Mad Hatter's spirit finally takes control of her body. As Violet cuts a bloody swath through Arcane Acre, Skye and the others must join together if they wish to survive. And if that wasn't enough, just wait until you see what the Dark Horde has planned.
